menuController

Class MenuController

  • java.lang.Object
    • menuController.MenuController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class MenuController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    This class manages all menu navigation through a common ActionListener which is passed to all display Panels. Any user action generates an event whose source is determined and the associated outcome is executed by this class.
    Author:
    Eric Liou

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MenuController()
      Constructs a new Menu Controller, with all menu display panels added to a common JFrame
